name: Dark Shots
description:
Dark Shots is a hardcore top-down shooter that takes the concept of combat and darkness and mixes them up. Be the best space criminal you can and fight through a spaceship of enemies and darkness.

Game created by:Loxmer Larson

Music by:Loxo3000

Revolver models by:Ducki,textured and edited by loxmer larson

sounds from:Freesounds.org

Note:If the web version lags then it is highly suggested you download the game.
